title: Tri color Capsicum Rice | Corn Capsicum Rice üòÉ | Lunch Box Recipe
content:
Main course: Corn Capsicum Rice Servings: 3 As I‚Äôm curious to prepare a recipe should be something new in taste, in looks, gives you pungent flavor in rice, so I prepared this quick lunch box recipe by using my favorite Tri color Capsicum and corn with new twisted spices and¬†infused with flavored garlic added perfect aroma to the dish. It is a blockbuster recipe at home üòç I‚Äôm on cloud nine to share this tasty lunch box recipe and I can take next step to explore more new variety dishes. Today I prepared a flavored rice with the combination of whole spices, Tri color Capsicum and sweet corn kernels ¬†and more add ons üôÇ Duration: 40 mins I hope you could try and enjoy the dish. Let‚Äôs start with Ingredients and Procedure Ingredients:
  • Basmati Rice - Cooked - 1 cup (240 gms)
  • Capsicum ( Yellow, Orange & Red ) - ¬†1 cup (each ) - Diced
  • Sweet corn kernels - 1 cup
  • Onion - 1 medium sized - sliced
  • Kashmiri red chillies(5), 1 Small cinnamon stick , Star anise ( half piece) - Soak in hot water
  • Butter - 4 Tb sp
  • Garlic cloves - Peeled off - Finely chopped
  • Cashew Nuts - 10 pieces
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Cloves - 2
  • Cinnamon stick - 1/2 inch
  • Cardamom - 2
  • Bay leaves - 2 - dried
  • Fresh bay leaf - 1
  • Star anise - 1
  • Curd - 80 ml
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Oil - Few drops
  • Kasuri Methi / Dried fenugreek leaves - powdered- 1 tsp
  • Spring Onions - Garnish
Procedure: Pre-preparation: Red chilly Paste:
  • In a bowl add Kashmiri dry Red chillies , cinnamon stick and half star anise
  • Add half cup of hot water (120 ml )
  • Soak 15 minutes
  • Let it become cool & blend altogether in mixer grinder
  • Make smooth paste & keep aside
Cooking Basmati Rice:
  • In a large bowl add one liter water along with 2 cloves, 2 cardamom, 2 bay leaves, 1 Star anise, small cinnamon stick
  • Mix well & let it boil. Meanwhile wash Basmati rice twice & keep aside
  • When water started boiling add washed basmati rice & few drops oil
  • Cover with lid and cook rice
  • After 5 mins, cover the lid half of the bowl
  • Let pressure goes out & cook over medium heat
  • When rice cooked upto 70% then turn off heat
  • Strain water in colander
  • Let the rice become cool
  • Basmati rice is ready
  • While adding Basmati rice in corn Capsicum masala remove all added whole Garam masala spices (cinnamon, cloves, bay leaves etc.,)
Process of making Corn Capsicum Rice / Tri color Capsicum Rice:
  • Heat deep frying pan or skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add butter, Cumin seeds, bay leaf, cashew nuts and chopped garlic cloves
  • Fry till garlic changes to brown color
  • Next add red chilly paste and saute 2 minutes
  • Then add chopped onion and saut√© 2 minutes
  • After that add chopped tri color capsicum and sweet corn, mix well
  • Saute 2 more minutes
  • Add in turmeric powder, red chilly powder, Garam masala powder, salt & combine well
  • Then add curd & Mix well
  • Cook 2 more minutes and add cooked Basmati rice
  • Gently Mix, cover with lid and cook 10 minutes on low heat
  • Next add kasuri methi Powder, Mix well and cook more 5 minutes ( by covering with lid)
  • Turn off heat and garnish with spring onion greens
  • Serve hot & Enjoy your meal
  • Happy Cooking & Have a great day üôÇ
